// * Tigrigna language locale for Eritrea.
// * Contributed by Daniel Yacob <yacob@geez.org>, Ge'ez Frontier Foundation

ti_ER{ 
    Version{ "2.0" }
    // Measurement { "Metric" }
//    NumberElements {
//        ".",
//        ",",
//        ";",
//        "%",
//        "0",
//        "#",
//        "-",
//        "E",
//        "\u2030",
//        "\u221E",
//        "\uFFFD",
//    }
    NumberPatterns {
        "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
        "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4#,##0.00",
        "#,##0%",
        "#E0",
    }

    // Currency display names
    Currencies {
        ERN { "$", "ERN" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm a",
                "EEEE\u1361 dd MMMM \u1218\u12D3\u120D\u1272 yyyy G",
                "dd MMMM yyyy",
                "dd-MMM-yy",
                "dd/MM/yy",
                "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                        "\u1230\u1295\u1260",
                        "\u1230\u1291\u12ED",
                        "\u1230\u1209\u1235",
                        "\u1228\u1261\u12D5",
                        "\u1213\u1219\u1235",
                        "\u12D3\u122D\u1262",
                        "\u1240\u12F3\u121D",
                    }
                    wide{
                        "\u1230\u1295\u1260\u1275",
                        "\u1230\u1291\u12ED",
                        "\u1230\u1209\u1235",
                        "\u1228\u1261\u12D5",
                        "\u1213\u1219\u1235",
                        "\u12D3\u122D\u1262",
                        "\u1240\u12F3\u121D",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                        "\u1325\u122A",
                        "\u1208\u12AB\u1272",
                        "\u1218\u130B\u1262",
                        "\u121A\u12EB\u12DD",
                        "\u130D\u1295\u1266",
                        "\u1230\u1290",
                        "\u1213\u121D\u1208",
                        "\u1290\u1213\u1230",
                        "\u1218\u1235\u12A8",
                        "\u1325\u1245\u121D",
                        "\u1215\u12F3\u122D",
                        "\u1273\u1215\u1233",
                    }
                    wide{
                        "\u1325\u122A",
                        "\u1208\u12AB\u1272\u1275",
                        "\u1218\u130B\u1262\u1275",
                        "\u121A\u12EB\u12DD\u12EB",
                        "\u130D\u1295\u1266\u1275",
                        "\u1230\u1290",
                        "\u1213\u121D\u1208",
                        "\u1290\u1213\u1230",
                        "\u1218\u1235\u12A8\u1228\u121D",
                        "\u1325\u1245\u121D\u1272",
                        "\u1215\u12F3\u122D",
                        "\u1273\u1215\u1233\u1235",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
